item.description:
Hello Everyone!

It is almost time to welcome in November, and there is no better way than an afternoon of a sport close to Canadian hearts.  Don't miss out on our only curling event of the year! 

The Petersham Curling Club is again our destination hosted by Peter Stokes of  Queen's Alumni Boston. 

All skill levels from total rookie to experienced skip are welcome.

Club members will welcome us to their club with some basic instruction, and then we'll have some time for everyone to play in some games. To finish, we'll have barbecue dinner from Redbones in Somerville. The curling club has a cash bar. 

To Register, follow the link to the Queen's site, enter information, complete payment of $30.

The limit is set by Peter at 40, and is a first come first serve basis. If you can register, go for it.

http://www.queensu.ca/alumni/networking/branches/usa/boston/eventCurling.html

Please only RSVP when you have registered and paid.

Transportation will be by car pooling.  I can take 3 people (first to email me) to start it off. People with car space, make yourself known!

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Autumn Curling!
